title: RocketStars: Leading the engineering team for Delta IV Heavy
summary: Once a pastry chef and now a respected rocket scientist, Steen Vecchi is the vehicle systems engineer for the United Launch Alliance (ULA) Delta IV Heavy that will perform another critical mission for U.S. national security on June 21.
